entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • C# LSP in Razor scenarios returns `null` completion results when typing quickly #56886
  • BuildWithSkipAnalyzers is breaking FastUpToDate #56883
  • Simplify member access (IDE0002) code style rule suggestion generates broken code #56882
  • Target-typed new expression does not work with params method signature when invoked with a single argument #56880
  • Roslyn emits redundant non-taken conditional branch for Nullable<T> == comparison #56875

Closed

  • Find refs integration tests need to verify navigation works #55978
    17.1
  • Non deterministic build result for structure. #53865
    17.0
  • Roslyn needs to unify onto a single version of the wait indicator service #23186
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #56887
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Resolves issue #53426, translations missing #56885
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Avoid UI thread dependency in IAsyncServiceProvider.GetServiceAsync<TService, TInterface> #56884
    Area-IDE
  • Add info to logs so we can determine issue serializing options #56881
    Area-IDE
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1395758 #56877
  • Don't offer fix if there are syntax errors that could cause a crash #56874
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56873
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #56867
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1395771 #56879
    auto-merge
  • Merge main into snappy. #56878
    Area-IDE, auto-merge, Needs UX Triage
  • Added navigation to find references integration tests #56866
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #56872
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1395644 #56876
    auto-merge
  • Remove containing type from lightbulb for AddParameter and GenerateMember #56846
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1393966 #56865
    auto-merge
  • Do not assume the first registered workspace is the one to use in LSP. #56871
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1394322 #56868
    auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to main #56869
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #56870
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add documentation and unit test #56751
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove user facing option around async-lightbulbs (17.1 and up only) #56858
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage, Next
  • Switch to ImmutableArray from raw arrays to prevent accidental mutation #56849
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Delete remaining bits of IWaitIndicator #56355
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add anonymous method example to breaking changes document #56857
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Test, New Feature - Lambda Improvements
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1393171 #56850
    auto-merge
  • Inline diagnostics and intellicode cohesion #55095
    Area-IDE, New Feature - Inline Errors, Next

Updated

  • Update to the latest debugger contracts #56722
    Area-Interactive
  • See through ref pointer indirection when optimizing stack locals #56790
    Area-Compilers, 17.0
  • Fix formatting of attributes on lambdas #56639
    Area-IDE, 17.0
  • StackTrace Explorer Implementation #56315
    Area-IDE, UX Review Requested
  • Incremental Generator Work Tracking API Implementation #55469
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.0
  • Concurrency issue with fixed fields #56581
    Area-Compilers, 17.0
  • Merge features/snappy/nodelay to main-vs-deps #55078
    Area-Infrastructure, Needs UX Triage
  • Ensure we match equivalent paths when retrieving analyzer options in global configs #56588
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Editor Config, 17.0
  • Avoid UI dependency in CloudCache by passing along the solution folder #56829
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge
  • Allow us to dispose batches asynchronously #53768
    Area-IDE
  • BoundIncrementOperator - use BoundConversion nodes to represent operand/result conversions. #54466
    Area-Compilers
  • Render exception documentation texts. #56162
    Area-IDE
  • Add test verifying VB error ranges #56772
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Minor refactoring in SettingsUpdateHelper #55123
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Treat receviers as by-value for interpolated string handler constructors #56864
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Interpolated String Improvements, 17.0
  • [DNM] Redirect Roslyn PR to Helix Staging #56862
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Ensure local function invocations and method references always have null receivers #56395
    Area-Compilers, 17.1
  • Use ReadOnlySpan properties over array fields #56845
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.1
  • Provide quick info at #regionend showing #region message #56609
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Async lightbulb performance improvement for compiler analyzer execution #56844
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, 17.0
  • Navigate to PDB Source documents #56842
    Area-IDE
  • Avoid emitting synthesized delegate types for delegates that are not referenced #56747
    Area-Compilers
